mapper.select: SELECT blog_address as blogAddress, (select blog_name from blog_post p where p.blog_address=a.blog_address limit 1) as blogName, count(*) as accessCount FROM blog_access a WHERE date(accessed_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY blog_address ORDER BY accessCount DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count(1) FROM blog_access WHERE link like concat(#{linkPrefix}, '%')
SELECT count(1) FROM blog_access WHERE link=#{link}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_access ( blog_address, link, ip, accessed_at ) VALUES ( #{blogAddress}, #{link}, #{ip}, now() )
